title: Telegraph 21st July : Playing with Danger
selftext:
​

[Telegraph has been trying to rile the Supreme Leader for the past few years..but they seem to have taken it a notch higher of late. This is their front page where they are commenting on Supreme Leader's selective silence and delayed and reluctant response.](https://preview.redd.it/6jon3fbef9db1.png?width=1003&format=png&auto=webp&s=25b9a874753d6b613df74d16244aa22810007b9d)
comments: They have support from mamata and state government. They can balance the risk.
